name: Dreamcast Express Extra
overview: Dreamcast Express Extra is a Japanese Sega Dreamcast demo disc released as part of the Dreamcast Express series. Playable Demos: - Cool Boarders Burrrn - Shutokou Battle - Sonic Adventure International - SoulCalibur - Chu Chu Rocket Videos: - Shenmue - Space Channel 5 - DreamFlyer - Virtua Striker 2 ver.2000.1 - Seaman: Kindan no Pet
